main database your master database runs in one availability Zone one of our data centers and then a second standby
version which is synchronously kept up to date is run in the second
availability Zone if anything goes wrong with the first availability Zone the traffic is immediately switched over to
the second availability Zone giving you a fair amount of redundancy and backup of that existing database from the

is um at fault if it all um the instance isn't isn't reachable or on an instance
